alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 05 at 2:42PM CDT until November 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM CST SUNDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL MINNESOTA... The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 6 PM CST Sunday. * AFFECTED AREA...In Minnesota, Traverse and Big Stone. * WINDS...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * IMPACTS...
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
